jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing engineering team. You'll work on cutting-edge technology solutions and help build scalable systems that power our client's digital transformations.
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable software solutions
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Mentor junior developers and contribute to technical architecture decisions
Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards
Work with modern technologies and cloud platforms
requirements: 5+ years of software development experience
Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, or Java
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Knowledge of microservices architecture and DevOps practices
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
preferred: Experience with React, Node.js, or similar frameworks
Knowledge of containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with CI/CD pipelines
Understanding of database design and optimization
Previous consulting or client-facing experience
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Join our DevOps team to help build and maintain robust, scalable infrastructure that supports our client's applications and services. You'll work with cutting-edge cloud technologies and automation tools.
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Manage cloud infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code
Monitor and optimize system performance and reliability
Implement security best practices and compliance requirements
Collaborate with development teams to improve deployment processes
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps or infrastructure engineering experience
Strong knowledge of AWS, Azure, or GCP
Experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash, PowerShell)
Knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Understanding of networking and security principles
preferred: Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
Knowledge of GitOps practices
Experience with service mesh technologies
Understanding of microservices architecture
Certifications in cloud platforms
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options

jobs.title: Technical Recruiter
jobs.description: We're seeking a Technical Recruiter to help us find and attract top technology talent. You'll work closely with hiring managers and candidates to ensure successful placements and build strong relationships.
responsibilities: Source and recruit top technology professionals
Manage the full recruitment lifecycle from sourcing to placement
Build and maintain relationships with candidates and clients
Conduct technical interviews and assessments
Develop and implement recruitment strategies
Track and report on recruitment metrics
requirements: 3+ years of technical recruitment experience
Strong understanding of technology roles and skills
Experience with ATS and recruitment tools
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to assess technical skills and cultural fit
Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related field
preferred: Experience in technology staffing or consulting
Knowledge of emerging technology trends
Experience with technical assessment tools
Understanding of employment law and compliance
Network of technology professionals
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options

jobs.title: Senior Technology Consultant
jobs.description: Join our consulting team to help clients navigate digital transformation and technology strategy. You'll work with senior executives to develop and implement technology solutions that drive business value.
responsibilities: Lead technology strategy and digital transformation projects
Conduct technology assessments and provide recommendations
Develop technology roadmaps and implementation plans
Manage client relationships and project delivery
Mentor junior consultants and contribute to thought leadership
Stay current with technology trends and best practices
requirements: 7+ years of technology consulting or related experience
Strong understanding of enterprise technology architecture
Experience with digital transformation and cloud migration
Excellent client relationship and project management skills
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
MBA or advanced degree in technology or business
preferred: Experience in specific industries (financial services, healthcare, etc.)
Knowledge of emerging technologies (AI, blockchain, IoT)
Experience with change management and organizational transformation
Published thought leadership or speaking experience
Certifications in relevant technologies or methodologies
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options

jobs.title: Integration Developer
jobs.description: Help us build seamless integrations that connect disparate systems and automate business processes. You'll work with modern integration technologies and cloud platforms to deliver robust solutions.
responsibilities: Design and develop API integrations and middleware solutions
Implement data transformation and ETL processes
Work with various integration platforms and tools
Ensure security and compliance in integration solutions
Collaborate with clients to understand integration requirements
Maintain and optimize existing integration systems
requirements: 4+ years of integration development experience
Strong knowledge of REST APIs, GraphQL, and web services
Experience with integration platforms (MuleSoft, Boomi, etc.)
Proficiency in programming languages (Java, Python, JavaScript)
Understanding of data formats (JSON, XML, CSV)
Knowledge of cloud platforms and services
preferred: Experience with enterprise systems (SAP, Salesforce, etc.)
Knowledge of message queues and event-driven architecture
Experience with API management and gateway solutions
Understanding of data governance and security
Certifications in integration platforms
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Lead our marketing efforts to build brand awareness and generate qualified leads. You'll develop and execute marketing strategies that position SourceCloud as a leader in technology staffing and consulting.
responsibilities: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies
Manage digital marketing campaigns and lead generation
Create compelling content for various marketing channels
Analyze marketing performance and optimize campaigns
Manage relationships with marketing agencies and vendors
Collaborate with sales team to align marketing and sales efforts
requirements: 5+ years of B2B marketing experience
Strong understanding of digital marketing channels and tools
Experience with marketing automation and CRM systems
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Analytical mindset with ability to measure and optimize performance
Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
preferred: Experience in technology or professional services marketing
Knowledge of account-based marketing strategies
Experience with content marketing and thought leadership
Understanding of SEO and SEM best practices
Experience with marketing analytics and reporting tools
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options
